blogPost.excerpt: Every time we switch context, it takes us way longer to finish a task at hand. Aerotime creates space for deep work by stacking your meetings together & enables you to prioritize your most important tasks, in flow. Done across team, it saves even more hours.
blogPost.body: Every time we switch context, it takes us way longer to finish a task at hand. Aerotime creates space for deep work by stacking your meetings together & enables you to prioritize your most important tasks, in flow. Done across team, it saves even more hours.
blogPost.title: Aerotime - Group meetings together and find time for deep work
blogPost.author: Michael Seibel

localize.description: 每当我们切换上下文时，都会花费更多的时间来完成手头的任务。Aerotime通过将您的会议堆叠在一起，为深度工作创造空间，并使您能够在流程中优先处理最重要的任务。跨团队完成，可以节省更多的时间。
localize.tagline: 小组会议一起，找时间深入工作

localize.description: 每當我們切換上下文時，都會花費更多的時間來完成手頭的任務。Aerotime通過將您的會議堆疊在一起，爲深度工作創造空間，並使您能夠在流程中優先處理最重要的任務。跨團隊完成，可以節省更多的時間。
localize.tagline: 小組會議一起，找時間深入工作

previous.excerpt: 🖼Browse 50+ templates — pitch decks, sales proposals, briefs, & more 💡Get inspired by stunning decks built to enhance collaboration 🎨Instantly apply different design styles to any slide 💬Easily customize templates to match your brand 👉 https://pitch.com/templates
previous.title: Presentation templates by Pitch - Designed for big ideas and customizable for any story

localize.description: 🖼浏览50多个模板--推介会、销售建议、简报等 💡从为增强协作而构建的令人惊叹的幻灯片中获得灵感 🎨立即将不同的设计风格应用到任何幻灯片中 💬轻松定制模板以匹配您的品牌 👉 https://pitch.com/templates
localize.tagline: 专为大创意而设计，并可为任何故事定制。

localize.description: 🖼瀏覽50多個模板--推介會、銷售建議、簡報等 💡從爲增強協作而構建的令人驚歎的幻燈片中獲得靈感 🎨立即將不同的設計風格應用到任何幻燈片中 💬輕鬆定製模板以匹配您的品牌 👉 https://pitch.com/templates
localize.tagline: 專爲大創意而設計，並可爲任何故事定製。

next.excerpt: Weet is a video messaging tool that allows you to have asynchronous conversations with your team, partners, and customers. Weet includes instant recording, screen sharing, virtual background, video filters, emoji reactions, and rich comment options.
next.title: Weet - Asynchronous video communication for remote teams

localize.description: Weet是一个视频消息工具，它允许您与您的团队、合作伙伴和客户进行异步对话。Weet包括即时录音、屏幕共享、虚拟背景、视频过滤器、表情符号反应和丰富的评论选项。
localize.tagline: 远程团队的异步视频通信

localize.description: Weet是一個視頻消息工具，它允許您與您的團隊、合作伙伴和客戶進行異步對話。Weet包括即時錄音、屏幕共享、虛擬背景、視頻過濾器、表情符號反應和豐富的評論選項。
localize.tagline: 遠程團隊的異步視頻通信
